name: Attack of the Slime Dice
description:
Use WASD to move.

Use Left click to attack.

Use 1, 2 and 3 for abilities.

Hitting the dice changes the color of your sword to the color they land on.

Hitting slime with a sword of the same color dramatically increases damage.

When all slime are dead, you can enter the portal to the next island.

To interest with the portal, use the E Key.

If you die, you can retry by Use Left clicking.
